title: Deterministic BEV gating + missing reasons in diagnostics/report
scope: Implement deterministic BEV gating thresholds based on calibration metrics.
Write gate decision and reasons into diagnostics and report surfaces.
When gated-off, mark BEV artifacts missing with explicit missing_reason.
acceptance: Gating thresholds are encoded in code and emitted in diagnostics.
When gated-off, bev.mp4 is not produced and missing_reason is explicit.
When gated-on, downstream BEV projection is enabled.

deliverables.title: BEV gating implementation and diagnostics
acceptance: Gating emits pass/fail with reasons and thresholds deterministically.
Diagnostics are consumed by report surfaces.

subtasks.title: Implement gating decision output and integrate into report metadata.
done_when: BEV gate decision is written to diagnostics/quality_summary.json.
Bundles mark bev.mp4 missing with explicit reason when gated-off.
